lyric:
[00:08.63]We were staying in Paris
[00:10.88]To get away from your parents
[00:12.49]And I thought "Wow, if I could take this in a shot right now
[00:16.12]I don't think that we could work this out"
[00:18.30]
[00:18.50]Out on the terrace
[00:20.65]I don't know if it's fair
[00:21.84]But I thought "How could I let you fall by yourself
[00:25.67]While I'm wasted for someone else"
[00:28.23]
[00:28.45]If we go down then we go down together
[00:33.23]They'll say you could do anything
[00:35.65]They'll say that I was clever
[00:38.00]If we go down then we go down together
[00:42.82]We'll get away with everything
[00:45.26]Let's show them we are better

[00:54.72]Let's show them we are better
[00:56.62]

[00:58.95]To get away from your parents

[01:06.45]

[01:08.64]We breathe in the air of this small town

tlyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:08.63]我们在巴黎逗留
[00:10.88]只为逃离你家人的左右
[00:12.49]有时我会想 噢要是麻烦能立马解决掉就好了
[00:16.12]但我想这次可能做不到了
[00:18.30]
[00:18.50]在阳台之上
[00:20.65]我开始想或许并不公平
[00:21.84]就这样让你放任自流
[00:25.67]尤其当有其他人伴我身旁
[00:28.23]
[00:28.45]如果决定要走那我们就一起走
[00:33.23]人人都说你能做到一切
[00:35.65]说我足够聪颖果决
[00:38.00]如果决定好了那我们就一起行动
[00:42.82]我们可以远离不想要的一切
[00:45.26]就让世界看到我们更好的一面
[00:49.98]就让我们共同走向更好的明天
[00:54.72]让世界见证我们日渐美好完全
[00:56.62]
[00:56.64]我们在巴黎逗留

[01:01.71]眉头小皱地抽起一支烟

[01:06.45]

[01:16.29]
